class_notes: EMPH Students Only; Outside permission to enroll in course must be approved by EMPH leadership. EMPH Opening Weekend is 1/7-1/9 and Closing Weekend is 4/8-4/10.
course_description: This course presents the basics of questionnaire development and data analysis, as well as the interpretation and reporting of findings. The course introduces students to both quantitative and qualitative data methods. The course introduces students to both quantitative and qualitative data methods.
prerequisites: BIOS 503D or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 3291, Section #: 901, Type: SEM, Campus: ATL, Meets: FSa 8:30-11:30a, Instructor: P. Loosier, Status: Open
